name: Tacx Neo 2T Smart Trainer - Unisex
description: The most advanced bike trainer available. Powerful, accurate and realistic. The Tacx Neo 2T have been improved again, with redesigned magnets, making your training experience even quieter with less sway. Full pedal stroke analysis lets you measure your left and right leg power individually. The road surface simulation blurs the line between virtual and real rides so you can really feel the cobblestones of Paris-Roubaix. And since this is a direct-drive trainer, you don’t need to think twice about slippage with no need for calibration. Press uphill with up to 2200W of resistance and 25% incline, or coast down -5% descents. The Neo 2T is the strong but silent type, so you can ride when your kids or dogs are still snoozing. It links with the usual bike app suspects, so you can cruise and compete with friends (or foes).Magnetic trainer provides a predicatable and consistent linear increase in resistance.Direct drive trainer accounts for every Watt you generate.Power reading accuracy of 1% ensures maximum precision in your training.A new powerful chip and memory upgrade makes the Neo 2 ready for future development.Cassette body fits Shimano and SRAM 8-12 speed cassettes. Campy, SRAM XD and SRAM XD-R body sold separately.Can be controlled by Tacx's app, Zwift, TrainerRoad, Kinomap or other apps.FE-C control lets your app of choice change resistance.ERG mode allows you to maintain a certain effort level regardless of your cadence.Road feel replicates cobblestones, cement plates, gravel roads and other surfaces.Realistic slope simulation of up to 25% and descent to -5%.Maximum brake power of 2200W.Virtual flywheel ensures you get a realistic simulation based on your weight and the course you're riding.Road feel and downhill drive won't be available when used without external power.Integrated LED light gauges intensity.Suits axles in Race 130mm, MTB 135mm, 142 mm and 148 mm.Adapters included for 142x12mm and 148x12mm axles. Adapter for 135x10mm available separately.Cassette available separately.
